main.java.com.softserve.delivery.a8_2.vacationChecker.impl
Class VacationOverlapChecker

java.lang.Object
  main.java.com.softserve.delivery.a8_2.vacationChecker.impl.VacationOverlapChecker
All Implemented Interfaces:
VacationChecker
public class VacationOverlapChecker
extends java.lang.Object
implements VacationChecker

Version:
1.0.0

Main class for checking if two vacations overlap. Implements VacationChecker interface. The user is asked to enter four dates - start/end date for each vacation in a succession.

Author:
Ivan Rudnytskyj
